# Get Incident

# Description

Retrieves an incident in PagerDuty.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Incident - The ID of the incident. Select an ID from the available drop-down list. This field supports String type input.
* Include - An array of additional details to include, such as acknowledgers, agents, or assignees.









* Incidents - Automatically generated output variable.
